generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone surface that serves as a roadway, with cars and pedestrians present, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There are clearly defined pedestrian paths alongside the road, separated by curbs and tree-lined areas, which are sidewalks.
- building: Multiple buildings with storefronts and windows are visible along the street, including one with a "ZOHREN" sign.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalk and street, indicating vegetation.
- terrain: There is a grassy area visible on the right side of the image, which is terrain.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalks and crossing the street.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the street and one is visible in the middle of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those holding traffic signs and street lamps.
- traffic sign: A blue traffic sign with a "T" symbol and a red circle with a diagonal line are visible on a pole.
- bicycle: At least one bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk near the storefronts.
